name: html-parser
description: Policy and tooling baseline for an agent-first TypeScript HTML parser.

scripts.test: npm run build && node --test test/**/*.test.js tests/**/*.test.js
scripts.test:control: npm run build && node --test test/control/**/*.test.js tests/control/**/*.test.js
scripts.eval:ci: node scripts/eval/check-docs.mjs && node scripts/eval/check-no-node-builtins.mjs && node scripts/eval/pack-check.mjs && node scripts/eval/check-gates.mjs --profile=ci && node scripts/eval/score.mjs --profile=ci && node scripts/eval/report.mjs --profile=ci
scripts.eval:release: node scripts/eval/check-docs.mjs && node scripts/eval/check-no-node-builtins.mjs && node scripts/eval/pack-check.mjs && node scripts/eval/check-gates.mjs --profile=release && node scripts/eval/score.mjs --profile=release && node scripts/eval/report.mjs --profile=release
